Package org.gvsig.topology

Interface Summary
IOneLyrRule Interface for all rules that applies to only one layer
IRuleWithClusterTolerance Marker interface wich must be implemented by all these rules that works with cluster tolerances.
ITopologyErrorContainer All classes that contains TopologyError must implement this interface.
ITopologyErrorFix Automatic error fix for a given topology error.
ITopologyRule A topology rule checks that features' geometry of one or more layers verifies a given spatial condition.
ITopologyRuleWithExclusiveFix Interface for those topology rules whose fixes may be exclusives (apply one fix or another one in function of the error)
ITopologyStatus This interface has all posible status of a Topology in relation with its status of validation.
ITwoLyrRule interface for all rules that applies to two layers
Topology.ITopologyStatusListener Interface for all of these classes interested in listening topology change status events.
 

Class Summary
AbstractTopologyRule Default implementation of ITopologyRule
FGeometryUtilTest  
GeometrySnapperTest  
JtsSnapTest In these tests we are trying to probe the use of snapping and precision reduction in JTS operations, to avoid undesired effects (for example spureus lines in dissolve) and to allow clustering tolerance in topologies.
JtsUtilTest  
LineStringSelfIntersectionTest To see visually the geometries used for testing, use JTS Test editor and paste WKT code.
Messages Bridge class to provide internationalization services to the library.
SimpleTopologyErrorContainer Simple implementation of TopologyErrorContainer.
SnapAndCrackTest Unit tests for GeometryCrack and GeometrySnap classes.
Topology This class represents a Topology, as a group of vectorial layers and topology rules that checks geometries and their spatial relationships of these layers.
TopologyError Error produced when one or many features dont pass a topology rule.
TopologyPersister Class with the responsability of persist topologies and their elements.
TopologyRuleFactory Factory to create ITopologyRule implementations.
TopologyTest Unit tests for Topology class.
 

Exception Summary
RuleNotAllowedException Exception launched when we try to add an incorrect rule to a Topology
TopologyRuleDefinitionException Exception throwed when a topology rule is wrong defined.
WrongLyrForTopologyException Exception launched when we try to add a layer that is not a FLyrVect to a Topology FLayers.
